main event: A cigar-shaped object with a large front light was seen hovering over March AFB, then started moving erratically and landed out of sight.
interesting points: The object was seen hovering for 5-6 minutes.
The object moved erratically before landing out of sight.
The report indicates the sighting was likely caused by a balloon.
Weather conditions at the time are described, including cloud cover and wind speeds.
An aircraft was reported overhead moving east during the sighting.
result: Possibly Balloon, Possibly Astronomical, Insufficient Data for Evaluation, Unknown
sighted object: Cigar-shaped object with large front light
